name: Ollie and Flip - Arcade Snowboarding
description:
Ollie & Flip is a challenging and fast-paced snowboarding game that features Ollie the Bunny, Flip the Fox, and other cute woodland creatures!

Race down winter courses, avoiding obstacles, and catch sick air on snow ramps! The game includes 3 Worlds:
• Bunny Slope: 20 challenge levels that test your jump, trick and carving skills down each course road!
• Longtooth Mountain: An endless snowboard run designed to test your skills and endurance. Beat your high score!
• Spring Valley: 8 exciting new levels that feature amazing downhill snow fun

The game uses challenging touch controls: drag to steer, tap to jump, and swipe to perform tricks while in the air.

New levels, worlds, modes, and playable characters will be included in future updates!

The game is free to download, with an in-app purchase to remove ads and to unlock additional playable characters. New characters include: Toodle the Raccoon and Mollie the Bunny. Bonus new spring costumes for Ollie and Flip!
